forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low near 5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
